Package ohos.media.common

Class StorageProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.StorageProperty

  • public final class StorageProperty
extends Object
    Obtains storage properties of audio and video files. The information is for audio and video recording.
    • getRecorderMaxDurationMs() obtains the maximum duration (in milliseconds) of a recording session.
    • getRecorderMaxFileSizeBytes() obtains the maximum file size (in bytes) of a recording session.
    • getRecorderFd() obtains the file descriptor of a file to be written.
    • getRecorderFile() obtains a file object to be written.
    • getRecorderPath() obtains the path of an output file to be generated.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA
